import React from'react';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Container}from'react-bootstrap';import'./Graph.css';// Import the CSS file
import{Chart as ChartJS,BarElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,Tooltip,Legend,Title}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(BarElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,Tooltip,Legend,Title);var Graph=function Graph(_ref){var chartData=_ref.chartData;var data={labels:['A','B','C','D','F'],datasets:[{label:'Grade Distribution',data:[chartData.A,chartData.B,chartData.C,chartData.D,chartData.F],backgroundColor:['rgba(0, 128, 0, 0.7)','rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.7)','rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.7)','rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.7)','rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.7)'],borderColor:'black',borderWidth:1}]};var options={responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true,title:{display:true,text:'Student Count',font:{size:14,weight:'bold'}}},x:{title:{display:true,text:'Grades',font:{size:14,weight:'bold'}}}},plugins:{title:{display:true,text:'Grade Distribution Bar Chart',font:{size:16,weight:'bold'}},legend:{display:false}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"graph-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{className:"graph-bar",data:data,options:options})})});};export default Graph;
